Forget the password? Import mnemonics or private keys to reply

This software does not store user passwords and cannot provide retrieve or reset functions. If the password is forgotten, the user can only set a new password after re-importing it through his own backup wallet private key or mnemonic\nIf your wallet has no mnemonic , you can create a new wallet first, and then import it through the private key.
It is strongly recommended that you make a backup before using your wallet and keep your wallet private key in a safe place
Please write down your wallet mnemonic and keep it in a safe place

Wallet mnemonics are used to restore wallet property. If you have mnemonics, you can control wallet property completely. Please keep them properly. Losing mnemonics means losing wallet property. This software can not provide retrieve function
Please click in order to verify that your backup mnemonics are correct according to the mnemonics you have written down.。
With a private key, you have complete control over the property of the address and do not share them with anyone
Here is your address and private key. Click to copy it
Please copy and paste the Keystore file to secure, offline and local storage. \n Do not save it to mailbox, notebook, Internet disk, chat tool, very dangerous

Do not transfer Keystore files through network tools. Once acquired by hackers, it will cause irreparable loss of property. It is recommended that offline devices be transmitted by scanning two-dimensional codes
For online storage, it is recommended that Keystore be saved using password-keeping software such as secure registration, higher password, etc

resources.string: Copied,please search and pasted on WeChat
Password must not be less than 8 bits
private key can not be empty
issue number can not be empty
Full name can not be empty
How to transfer and collect money
How to issue a Fungible Token
How to issue a Non-fungible token

EveriWallet is a wallet application developed for the everiToken public chain. In addition to the transfer and collection functions, the wallet supports special functions: the wallet supports two kinds of digital assets, Fungible Token (points, standardized traditional digital assets), and Non-fungible tokens (notes, real estate, and other assets with unique attributes); Supports users to complete their own issuance of tokens in order to manage throughout the entire life cycle of digital assets.

Start the wallet program. According to the guide , there will be two options: [Create Wallet] and [Restore Identity]. Click on [Create Wallet] and input the user password. EveriWallet does not store user’s passwords. If user loses the password, the user can only be reset by re-importing the backup wallet private key or mnemonic codes.

EveriWallet currently supports two ways to back up your wallet: exporting mnemonic codes or private keys. Users only need to use a set of mnemonic codes to manage multiple wallets and their personal data. Specific operation: Select the wallet to be backed up in [My]-[Wallet Manage] at the bottom of the main interface of the wallet. Then you can choose to export the mnemonic codes and the private key. You may also reset your user password here.

Everiwallet provides two ways to import your wallet. The first way is to select the [Resume Identity] and then enter the backup wallet’s mnemonic codes (12 English words, separated by spaces) or the private key. After that, users can enter the wallet’s user password. The second way is to import the wallet through [My]-[Wallet Manage] located at the bottom of the wallet’s main interface,as above.

Every EveriWallet account has both Fungible Token and Non-fungible token. For Fungible Token, Everiwallet provides transfer and collection services. The wallet’s main interface lists the user’s Fungible Token below [My Token]. Clicking on one of them to display the transaction record and you can transfer and collection this token here.

The domain uses flexible rights management to reflect a type of certificate for different application scenarios. Each token belongs to a specific domain, and the domain has a unique domain name. The domain information and the rights management can be queried through the domain name of the token.
Fungible Token is used to represent the points, standardized digital assets, and other assets without a unique nature. Clicking on [my token money] in the main interface to show my Fungible Token.
Non-fungible token is used to represent tickets, real estate, academic certificates and other assets with a unique nature. Clicking on [my token] in the main interface to show my Non-fungible tokens.
Enter the wallet’s main interface, click [Issue], select issue Fungible Token, then input the asset number, symbol, total amount, icon or edit permission, and finally click the [Submit].

Enter the wallet’s main interface, click [Issue], click [Create Domain], then input the domain name, click the release column [Add], add an address or add a group, and enter the public key, weight and threshold respectively. Click the transfer bar and the management bar to add, and set the corresponding permissions, and finally click the [Submit].

EveriPay is used for face-to-face payment below the line. The user displays the payment QR code to the merchant by setting the maximum payment amount. The merchant verified the token by scanning the QR code. Other Fungible Token can also be paid by everiPay. For example, if a product needs 4000 points from a supermarket, the merchant will charge off 4000 this token by scanning the QR code. If the condition is met, the user’s address will be deducted 4000 points.

EveriPass is used for face-to-face application scenarios. The third party can verify the authenticity of the token contained in a QR code by code scanner. For example, a diploma can be made as a Non-fungible token and generate a QR code. The third party scans through everiPass and the system returns the authenticity of the pass.
In the main interface of the wallet, select [My] - [System Settings] - [Select Language] and switch the language to 简体中文 or English.
Please scan with the same wallet
Different with Ethereum\'s writing smart contract, EveriWallet can quickly create a Token by setting symbols, amounts, Icons, and so on through visual forms.
Symbol refers to the name of Token, which is defined as up to 7 uppercase letters.For example, EVT, PEVT
The unique number to Identity a Fungible Token.In EveriWallet, #1 means EVT and #2 means PEVT.
Total Supply refers to the total number of a Token.
You can enter a number from 0–18, for example, enter 2, which means the token can be accurate to 0.01.
For convinient, EveriWallet will store Token\'s Icon on everiToken.It will cost part of the service fee(EVT/PEVT) and we recommend you use 180x180 pixel pictures.
Domain names consist of up to 21 specified characters [0–9，A-Z，a-z.-]， and Non-Fungible Tokens are organized and managed by setting authoritiy management in domain.
This icon cannot be modified. Recommended to use transparent bottom PNG format.
Please Enter a valid Node Address
The wallet is already on the list

Group names consists of a up of 21 specified characters [0-9, A-Z, a-z.-], and can be assigned to a certain group by realizing the functions similar to the organizational structure in real life, thereby realizing group management of specific assets.
The scanned content of QR code
